name: TERRA NOVA - A World to Conquer
name_original: TERRA NOVA - A World to Conquer
description:
Terra Nova is a rougelite Card game in wich the player leads explorations into a mythical jungle on a lost continent. Obtain items, customize your exploration and survive hostile environments.

This game was produced by one person as a Semester Project within three months. Furthermore this is my first digital project so there might still be bugs.
